Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: In terms of GenAI, although sometimes it does make some ridiculous mistakes, it still help me a lot in the way I express myself. For example, I will ask GenAI to make my essay look more professional and structured. Teacher, on the other hand, change our way of thinking by providing me with new ideas and angles.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I sometimes feel GenAI making feedback too casual compared to the one given by teachers.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI might sometimes be generous and easy to be seen somewhere. My teacher will give me feedback according to my work in a more specific way.
